mn37:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati pubbarame migaramatupasade.
mn37:2.1: Atha kho sakko devanamindo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho sakko devanamindo bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn37:2.2: “kittavata nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu sankhittena tanhasankhayavimutto hoti accantanittho accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacari accantapariyosano settho devamanussanan”ti?
mn37:3.5: So sabbam dhammam abhijanati; sabbam dhammam abhinnaya sabbam dhammam parijanati; sabbam dhammam parinnaya yam kinci vedanam vedeti—
mn37:3.6: sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va, so tasu vedanasu aniccanupassi viharati, viraganupassi viharati, nirodhanupassi viharati, patinissagganupassi viharati.
mn37:3.7: So tasu vedanasu aniccanupassi viharanto, viraganupassi viharanto, nirodhanupassi viharanto, patinissagganupassi viharanto na kinci loke upadiyati.
mn37:3.8: Anupadiyam na paritassati, aparitassam paccattanneva parinibbayati:
mn37:3.9: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
mn37:3.10: Ettavata kho, devanaminda, bhikkhu sankhittena tanhasankhayavimutto hoti accantanittho accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacari accantapariyosano settho devamanussanan”ti.
mn37:4.1: Atha kho sakko devanamindo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi.
mn37:5.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma mahamoggallano bhagavato avidure nisinno hoti.
mn37:5.3: “kim nu kho so yakkho bhagavato bhasitam abhisamecca anumodi udahu no;
mn37:5.5: yadi va so yakkho bhagavato bhasitam abhisamecca anumodi yadi va no”ti?
mn37:6.1: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evameva—pubbarame migaramatupasade antarahito devesu tavatimsesu paturahosi.
mn37:7.1: Tena kho pana samayena sakko devanamindo ekapundarike uyyane dibbehi pancahi turiyasatehi samappito samangibhuto paricareti.
mn37:7.2: Addasa kho sakko devanamindo ayasmantam mahamoggallanam duratova agacchantam.
mn37:7.3: Disvana tani dibbani panca turiyasatani patippanametva yenayasma mahamoggallano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahamoggallanam etadavoca:
mn37:7.4: “ehi kho, marisa moggallana, svagatam, marisa moggallana.
mn37:7.5: Cirassam kho, marisa moggallana, imam pariyayam akasi yadidam idhagamanaya.
mn37:7.7: Nisidi kho ayasma mahamoggallano pannatte asane.
mn37:7.8: Sakkopi kho devanamindo annataram nicam asanam gahetva ekamantam nisidi.
mn37:7.9: Ekamantam nisinnam kho sakkam devanamindam ayasma mahamoggallano etadavoca:
mn37:8.1: “yatha katham pana kho, kosiya, bhagava sankhittena tanhasankhayavimuttim abhasi?
mn37:8.2: Sadhu mayampi etissa kathaya bhagino assama savanaya”ti.
mn37:8.4: appeva sakena karaniyena, api ca devanamyeva tavatimsanam karaniyena.
mn37:8.5: Api ca, marisa moggallana, sussutamyeva hoti suggahitam sumanasikatam supadharitam, yam no khippameva antaradhayati.
mn37:8.6: Bhutapubbam, marisa moggallana, devasurasangamo samupabyulho ahosi.
mn37:8.7: Tasmim kho pana, marisa moggallana, sangame deva jinimsu, asura parajinimsu.
mn37:8.8: So kho aham, marisa moggallana, tam sangamam abhivijinitva vijitasangamo tato patinivattitva vejayantam nama pasadam mapesim.
mn37:8.9: Vejayantassa kho, marisa moggallana, pasadassa ekasatam niyyuham.
mn37:8.13: Iccheyyasi no tvam, marisa moggallana, vejayantassa pasadassa ramaneyyakam datthun”ti?
mn37:9.1: Atha kho sakko ca devanamindo vessavano ca maharaja ayasmantam mahamoggallanam purakkhatva yena vejayanto pasado tenupasankamimsu.
mn37:9.2: Addasamsu kho sakkassa devanamindassa paricarikayo ayasmantam mahamoggallanam duratova agacchantam;
mn37:9.3: disva ottappamana hiriyamana sakam sakam ovarakam pavisimsu.
mn37:10.1: Seyyathapi nama sunisa sasuram disva ottappati hiriyati;
mn37:10.2: evameva sakkassa devanamindassa paricarikayo ayasmantam mahamoggallanam disva ottappamana hiriyamana sakam sakam ovarakam pavisimsu.
mn37:10.3: Atha kho sakko ca devanamindo vessavano ca maharaja ayasmantam mahamoggallanam vejayante pasade anucankamapenti anuvicarapenti:
mn37:10.4: “idampi, marisa moggallana, passa vejayantassa pasadassa ramaneyyakam;
mn37:10.5: idampi, marisa moggallana, passa vejayantassa pasadassa ramaneyyakan”ti.
mn37:10.6: “Sobhati idam ayasmato kosiyassa, yatha tam pubbe katapunnassa.
mn37:10.9: Tayidam ayasmato kosiyassa sobhati, yatha tam pubbe katapunnassa”ti.
mn37:11.4: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano tatharupam iddhabhisankharam abhisankhasi yatha vejayantam pasadam padangutthakena sankampesi sampakampesi sampavedhesi.
mn37:11.5: Atha kho sakko ca devanamindo, vessavano ca maharaja, deva ca tavatimsa acchariyabbhutacittajata ahesum:
mn37:11.7: Samanassa mahiddhikata mahanubhavata, yatra hi nama dibbabhavanam padangutthakena sankampessati sampakampessati sampavedhessati”ti.
mn37:12.1: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano sakkam devanamindam samviggam lomahatthajatam viditva sakkam devanamindam etadavoca:
mn37:12.2: “yatha katham pana kho, kosiya, bhagava sankhittena tanhasankhayavimuttim abhasi?
mn37:12.3: Sadhu mayampi etissa kathaya bhagino assama savanaya”ti.
mn37:12.4: “Idhaham, marisa moggallana, yena bhagava tenupasankamim; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasim. Ekamantam thito kho aham, marisa moggallana, bhagavantam etadavocam:
mn37:12.5: ‘kittavata nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu sankhittena tanhasankhayavimutto hoti accantanittho accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacari accantapariyosano settho devamanussanan’ti?
mn37:13.1: Evam vutte, marisa moggallana, bhagava mam etadavoca:
mn37:13.6: So sabbam dhammam abhijanati, sabbam dhammam abhinnaya sabbam dhammam parijanati, sabbam dhammam parinnaya yam kinci vedanam vedeti sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va.
mn37:13.7: So tasu vedanasu aniccanupassi viharati, viraganupassi viharati, nirodhanupassi viharati, patinissagganupassi viharati.
mn37:13.8: So tasu vedanasu aniccanupassi viharanto, viraganupassi viharanto, nirodhanupassi viharanto, patinissagganupassi viharanto na kinci loke upadiyati,
mn37:13.9: anupadiyam na paritassati, aparitassam paccattanneva parinibbayati:
mn37:13.10: “khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti pajanati.
mn37:13.11: Ettavata kho, devanaminda, bhikkhu sankhittena tanhasankhayavimutto hoti accantanittho accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacari accantapariyosano settho devamanussanan’ti.
mn37:13.12: Evam kho me, marisa moggallana, bhagava sankhittena tanhasankhayavimuttim abhasi”ti.
mn37:14.1: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano sakkassa devanamindassa bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evameva—devesu tavatimsesu antarahito pubbarame migaramatupasade paturahosi.
mn37:14.2: Atha kho sakkassa devanamindassa paricarikayo acirapakkante ayasmante mahamoggallane sakkam devanamindam etadavocum:
mn37:14.3: “eso nu te, marisa, so bhagava sattha”ti?
mn37:14.4: “Na kho me, marisa, so bhagava sattha.
mn37:14.8: Aho nuna te so bhagava sattha”ti.
mn37:15.1: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma mahamoggallano bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn37:15.2: “abhijanati no, bhante, bhagava ahu natannatarassa mahesakkhassa yakkhassa sankhittena tanhasankhayavimuttim bhasita”ti?
mn37:15.3: “Abhijanamaham, moggallana, idha sakko devanamindo yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho, moggallana, sakko devanamindo mam etadavoca:
mn37:15.4: ‘kittavata nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu sankhittena tanhasankhayavimutto hoti accantanittho accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacari accantapariyosano settho devamanussanan’ti.
mn37:15.5: Evam vutte, aham, moggallana, sakkam devanamindam etadavocam
mn37:15.8: Evam cetam, devanaminda, bhikkhuno sutam hoti
mn37:15.10: So sabbam dhammam abhijanati, sabbam dhammam abhinnaya sabbam dhammam parijanati, sabbam dhammam parinnaya yam kinci vedanam vedeti sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va.
mn37:15.11: So tasu vedanasu aniccanupassi viharati, viraganupassi viharati, nirodhanupassi viharati, patinissagganupassi viharati.
mn37:15.12: So tasu vedanasu aniccanupassi viharanto, viraganupassi viharanto, nirodhanupassi viharanto,
mn37:15.13: patinissagganupassi viharanto na kinci loke upadiyati,
mn37:15.14: anupadiyam na paritassati, aparitassam paccattanneva parinibbayati:
mn37:15.15: “khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti pajanati.
mn37:15.16: Ettavata kho, devanaminda, bhikkhu sankhittena tanhasankhayavimutto hoti accantanittho accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacari accantapariyosano settho devamanussanan’ti.
mn37:15.17: Evam kho aham, moggallana, abhijanami sakkassa devanamindassa sankhittena tanhasankhayavimuttim bhasita”ti.
mn37:15.19: Attamano ayasma mahamoggallano bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
